title: "Breakthrough AI Technique Enables Real-Time Rendering of Scenes in 3D From 2D Images"
excerpt: "The new machine-learning system can generate a 3D scene from an image about 15,000 times faster than other methods. Humans are pretty good at looking at a single two-dimensional image and understanding the full three-dimensional scene that it captures."
